body.text: Welcome to the Dialog Skill Prototype!
Here are some things you can do:
Send a text message to the bot (message, single-turn)
**m:some message** sends the text after **m:** directly to the skill and the skill does intent and entity recognition against LUIS.
**bookflight** sends an event to the skill with the name = 'BookFlight' to start a flight booking dialog.
Send a GetWeather invoke activity (invoke, single-turn)
**getweather** sends an invoke activity to the skill with the name = 'GetWeather'. The skill replies right away (Invoke activities are Request/Response).
**oauthtest** sends an event to the skill to start an OAuthCard dialog.
Send a message to the bot with values (message, single-turn)
**mv:some message** sends some complex object in the Value property of the activity in addition to the message after **mv:**.
**abort** during a multi-turn dialog (i.e. BookFlight) sends an EndOfConversation activity to the skill to cancel the conversation.
**cancel** during a multi-turn dialog (i.e. OAuthTest) is recognized by the skill, it cancels its current dialog and sends an EndOfConversation activity to the parent.
Use the suggested actions bellow to test different parent to skill interactions.
